author: Ross Burden
method: Place the eggs, egg yolks, caster sugar and cream into a large bowl and whisk together. Melt the butter in a large frying pan over a medium heat. Dip the brioche in the egg mixture then place into the frying pan and fry for two minutes on each side, until golden. To serve, place onto a warm plate.
ingredients: 4 free-range eggs,  2 free-range egg yolks,  25g/1oz caster sugar,  50ml/2fl oz double cream,  25g/1oz unsalted butter,  3 thick slices brioche
